definitions.definition: Having autism , or pertaining to autism.

definitions.label_groups: now derogatory , offensive , slang and medically obsolete

definitions.definition: Characterized by abnormal and unhealthy focus or persistence, and unhealthy hatred of opposition or criticism. Obsessive .
examples: imagine being this autistic over a fictional character
definitions.label_groups: Internet slang , 4chan slang , offensive or self-deprecatory

main_definition: Having autism , or pertaining to autism.
secondary_definitions: ( now derogatory , offensive , slang and medically obsolete ) Socially inept , self-absorbed , or stupid .
( Internet slang , 4chan slang , offensive or self-deprecatory ) Characterized by abnormal and unhealthy focus or persistence, and unhealthy hatred of opposition or criticism. Obsessive .
( slang , derogatory , offensive ) Lame , uncool , stupid .
